title: Weekly mix package
info:
120 minutes 120 messages 200  MB Internet for 7 days at the price of 45 Afghanis. 
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. 
Send A 45 to activate and D 45 to 740

title: Weekly mix package
info:
1000 minutes Hi by Hi  200 minutes to all Afghan networks for 7 days at the price of 270 Afghani. 
Press the green button to activate and press the red button to deactivate. 
To activate A ST and to deactivate D ST to 740  send it

title: Weekly mix package
info:
200  Salam to Salam minutes, 200 Salam messages and 40 minutes to all Afghan networks for 7 days at the price of 85 Afghani. 
Press the green button to activate and press the red button to deactivate. 
To activate A 85 and  To deactivate send D 85 to 740
